channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #塞内加尔--在达喀尔的一次竞选集会上，反建制候选人联盟的支持者坐在墙边高呼。📸@wesselsjohn1 #AFP
item.description:
#Senegal - Supporters for the coalition of anti-establishment candidates chant as sit on a wall during a campaign rally in Dakar.
📸@wesselsjohn1 #AFP pic.twitter.com/BiVBLO2Ynu

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：参加 Moomba 节 "鸟人拉力赛 "的人们身着盛装，用自制的飞行装置将自己抛入墨尔本的亚拉河。
item.description:
VIDEO: Particpants in the Moomba Festival's Birdman Rally fling themselves into Melbourne's Yarra River with costumes and inventive homemade flying devices. pic.twitter.com/QCdN11hWu7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #布林肯周一前往牙买加参加海地危机谈判：美国
item.description:
#BREAKING Blinken heading Monday to Jamaica for Haiti crisis talks: US pic.twitter.com/QgwnKYW8ir

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法国总统府表示，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙将 "在未来几周内 "前往乌克兰，这显然是对原定访问的再次推迟。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron is to travel to Ukraine "in the coming weeks" the presidency said, in an apparent new postponement of a visit that was supposed to have already taken place.https://t.co/tzP1bFbqE7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：印尼巴厘岛上的印度教徒为迎接印度教新年举行人像游行和净火仪式。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hindus in the Indonesian island of Bali hold an effigy parade and a purification fire ceremony in preparation for the Hindu new year. pic.twitter.com/hxHU0aq05m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 研究人员周一表示，过去五年来，欧洲的武器进口量几乎翻了一番，部分原因是乌克兰战争，而俄罗斯的出口量则减少了一半。
item.description:
Weapons imports to Europe nearly doubled over the past five years, partly due to the war in Ukraine, while exports from Russia halved, researchers said on Monday.https://t.co/iyO2SW8txf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：在吉尔吉斯斯坦的天山山脉，村民们建造了一座人工冰川，为干旱的农场提供用水。通过重新引导来自山峰的水流，人工冰川取代了因全球变暖而逐渐消失的天然冰川。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the Tian-Shan mountains of Kyrgyzstan, villagers have built an artificial glacier to provide water for their drought-hit farms. By re-directing water from the mountain's peaks, the glacier replaces natural glaciers, which are slowly disappearing due to global warming. pic.twitter.com/hP7UjsC8Sb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #威尔士王妃就编辑过的照片道歉：声明
item.description:
#BREAKING Princess of Wales apologises over edited photo: statement pic.twitter.com/QeNwO74oDU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》曾在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上大放异彩，但在 1945 年被第一颗核弹摧毁的广岛，这部关于核弹制造者的电影却让人难以接受。
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" had a glittering night at the Oscars but in Hiroshima, devastated by the first nuclear bomb in 1945, the film about the weapon's creator is harder to stomach.https://t.co/IrUpoHrQkh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：巴基斯坦在巴基斯坦最大城市的中心，妇女骑着摩托车在尘土飞扬的椭圆形场地上飞驰，这在这个文化保守的国家实属罕见。教新手骑两轮摩托车的 "狂野骑士 "正在为女性开启新的自由之路。
item.description:
VIDEO: Revving round a dusty oval in the heart of Pakistan's largest city, women on motorbikes is a rare sight in the culturally conservative country. Teaching novices to ride two-wheelers, the "Rowdy Riders" are unlocking a new tier of freedom for women. pic.twitter.com/lrX8SdEQ6b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周一，西班牙和欧盟向 2004 年 3 月 11 日马德里火车爆炸案的 192 名遇难者表示哀悼。
item.description:
Spain and the European Union pay homage Monday to the 192 victims of the March 11, 2004 Madrid train bombings that marked the start of mass Islamist attacks in Europe.https://t.co/SFOGxuBxRS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：在马里廷巴克图的街道上，数百人参加一年一度对金加雷伯大清真寺进行的细致而传统的修复工作。这项祖传技术包括使用石膏和粘土来修复和保护历史遗迹。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the streets of Mali's Timbuktu, hundreds take part in the annual meticulous and traditional restoration of the Great Djingareyber Mosque. The ancestral technique involves using use plaster and clay to revive and preserve the historic site. pic.twitter.com/26hht45k5s

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: ♻️ 高街时尚品牌经常吹嘘自己的绿色环保理念，但活动人士说，事实是 "回收利用对服装来说是个神话"➡️ by @AFP for #EDNHub
item.description:
♻️ High-street fashion brands often tout their green credentials but activists say the truth is that "recycling is a myth for clothing"
➡️ https://t.co/ZU8F2DROtk by @AFP for #EDNHub pic.twitter.com/mTuM8u43uo

— EU Data News Hub🇪🇺 (@EUDataNewsHub) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周一，中国领导人结束了为期一周的重要会议，他们在会上承认，要重振因房地产市场不景气、国内需求低迷和青年失业率屡创新高而受到打击的疲软经济，还需要做更多工作。
item.description:
China's leaders on Monday wrapped up a week-long key conclave at which they admitted more was needed to revive a sluggish economy battered by an ailing housing market, poor domestic demand and record-high youth unemployment.https://t.co/BqAfQdNEec

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：海地首都太子港正面临着日益严峻的人道主义局势，帮派暴力愈演愈烈。
item.description:
VIDEO: The Haitian capital Port-au-Prince is facing an increasingly precarious humanitarian situation as it spirals deeper into gang violence. pic.twitter.com/088i9GPj0n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 康斯坦丁（Konstantin）逃离俄罗斯是为了避免被征召入伍去乌克兰打仗。但他仍想在本月晚些时候举行的俄罗斯大选中发出自己的声音--尽管他没有人可以投他的票。
item.description:
Konstantin fled Russia to avoid being drafted into the army to fight in Ukraine. But he still wants to have his voice heard in Russia's elections later this month -- even though he has no one to vote for.https://t.co/OCVPCEBmhh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：从世界各地的时装走秀到巴黎的红磨坊歌舞剧和里约狂欢节，南非鸵鸟毛一直占据着舞台的中心。南非的鸵鸟羽毛在世界市场上占据主导地位，其中大部分来自小镇奥特肖恩（Oudtshoorn）。
item.description:
VIDEO: From fashion runways around the world to the Moulin Rouge cabaret in Paris and the Rio carnival, South African ostrich feathers have taken centre stage. The country dominates the world market with the majority of these feathers coming from the small town of Oudtshoorn. pic.twitter.com/lVjzgPVC79

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #Crufts2024 狗表演，由 #AFP 摄影师 @oliscarff 拍摄
item.description:
#Crufts2024 dog show by #AFP photographer @oliscarff pic.twitter.com/yRRfV1pDdc

item.title: 京都 "不是主题公园"。当地人抱怨说，痴迷于 Instagram 的游客 "狗仔队 "正在骚扰这座日本城市著名的、衣着整洁的艺妓，京都正在严厉打击这种行为。
item.description:
Kyoto is "not a theme park".

Kyoto is cracking down after locals complained that Instagram-obsessed tourist "paparazzi" are harassing the Japanese city's famous, immaculately dressed geisha.https://t.co/El8sz6UrOy pic.twitter.com/kWDQ3I9uWs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.description:
VIDEO: Reviving and preserving the Great Mosque of Timbuktu.

In the streets of Mali's Timbuktu, hundreds take part in the annual traditional and meticulous restoration of the Great Djingareyber Mosque. The ancestral technique involves using use plaster and clay to revive and… pic.twitter.com/P51wBJkXZS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 近几个月来，数百个模仿新闻机构的人工智能驱动网站层出不穷，助长了从战争到政客等各种虚假报道的爆炸式增长。
item.description:
Proliferating 'news' sites spew AI-generated fake stories.

Hundreds of AI-powered sites mimicking news outlets have cropped up in recent months, fueling an explosion of false narratives -- about everything from war to politicianshttps://t.co/7EqEDGk5gU pic.twitter.com/Lt5hrL8ap1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.description:
VIDEO: Artificial glaciers fight off drought in Kyrgyzstan.

In the Tian-Shan mountains of Kyrgyzstan, villagers have built an artificial glacier to provide water for their drought-hit farms. By re-directing water from the mountain's peaks, the glacier replaces natural glaciers,… pic.twitter.com/zlxaNPX881

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 普京将在没有反对派的选举中加冕。自 1999 年最后一天担任总统或总理以来，普京一直在镇压反对派和异议人士，对国内实行一定程度的控制，确保选举结果毫无疑问。
item.description:
Putin set for coronation in election with no opposition.

In power as president or prime minister since the final day of 1999, Putin has quashed opposition and dissent, exerting a level of domestic control that ensures the result is in no doubthttps://t.co/zT0nRkVB4p pic.twitter.com/3H3RmQAWxL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）为奥斯卡颁奖典礼带来了粉红色的活力
item.description:
Ryan Gosling brings pink-washed #Kenergy to the #Oscars https://t.co/FD9HraTC8R pic.twitter.com/kzZtzTU19X

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

Nerves and euphoria -- a peek backstage at the #Oscars from @andrewmarszal https://t.co/fhElmW0Gee pic.twitter.com/JqcnYZ5KGl

item.title: "奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）在好莱坞年度最盛大的颁奖晚会 #Oscars 上横扫全场，获得包括最佳影片和最佳导演在内的七项大奖，为电影人克里斯托弗-诺兰今年的胜利加冕。了解更多来自好莱坞的信息：
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" swept the board at the #Oscars, Hollywood's biggest night of the year, with seven awards including best picture and best director, crowning a triumphant year for filmmaker Christopher Nolan. Read more from Hollywood: https://t.co/c0nFHCZ12Q pic.twitter.com/WVKEh1MFm3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #韩国暂停 4,900 名罢工医生的行医执照
item.description:
#BREAKING South Korea moves to suspend the medical licences of 4,900 striking doctors pic.twitter.com/BzF686IaRH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）凭借《可怜的事》（Poor Things）获得奥斯卡最佳女主角。
